title: Person of Interest Season 4 Finale | Harold and The Machine 1/2
author: ReWatch TV
comment: its impressive how a fictional A.I. can make someone cry...

I loved that moment when the sound went right before the word "father" went across the screen. then....."Welcome my son".....

It gave me chills when I watched this because I knew the machine never talked to finch before....so I'm like...Yes!!!
The perfect song for that scene, just cannot wait for season 5 now.
Did-did I just cry over a computer program?
